channel.title: FLF - Let's Talk Eschatology
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Doug Wilson and Escondido, Christ's Active Obedience and Master's Seminary [Let's Talk Eschatology]
item.description:
In this episode of the "Reformed Reckoner", our news and topical show, Jon Wright, Josh Howard and Jacob Tanner discuss the recent conversaton between Doug Wilson, Jared Longshore, and Chris Gordon.

They also cover the recent discussion focused on Christ's active obedience and Master's Seminary's stance.
item.author: Jon Wright
item.itunes:author: Jon Wright
item.itunes:summary: When Christians Debate; Doug Wilson and Escondido, Christ's Active Obedience and Master's Seminary

item.title: Kendall Lankford: Postmillennialism, Covenant and Household, Eschatological Universalism [Let's Talk Eschatology]
item.description: Pastor and podcaster Kendall Lankford discusses postmillenialism, eschatological universalism, covenant households and more...
item.author: Jacob Tanner
item.itunes:author: Jacob Tanner
item.itunes:summary: Kendall Lankford: Postmillennialism, Covenant and Household, Eschatological Universalism

item.title: Jamie Bambrick: The Worst Thing About the Gospel Coalition, Politics In Great Britain and Europe [Let's Talk Eschatology]
item.description: Pastor Jamie Bambrick, and General Editor of Clear Truth Media, talks about a range of topics, including the problems with TGC and politics in the western world.
item.author: Josh Howard
item.itunes:author: Josh Howard
item.itunes:summary: Jamie Bambrick: The Worst Thing About the Gospel Coalition
